trans-unit.source: External user object attribute changes for Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration preview | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: External user object attribute changes for Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration preview | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory B2B supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory B2B supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications

trans-unit.source: External user object attribute changes for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration preview
trans-unit.target: External user object attribute changes for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration preview

trans-unit.source: Each user in an Azure AD directory is represented by a user object.
trans-unit.target: Each user in an Azure AD directory is represented by a user object.

trans-unit.source: The user object in Azure AD undergoes attribute changes in various stages of the B2B collaboration invite-redeem flow.
trans-unit.target: The user object in Azure AD undergoes attribute changes in various stages of the B2B collaboration invite-redeem flow.

trans-unit.source: The user object representing the partner user in the directory has attributes that change at redeem time, when the partner user clicks the link in the invite email.
trans-unit.target: The user object representing the partner user in the directory has attributes that change at redeem time, when the partner user clicks the link in the invite email.

trans-unit.source: The **DisplayName** attribute changes from the User Principal Name (user_fabrikam.com#EXT#@contoso.com) to the sign-in name (user@fabrikam.com)
trans-unit.target: The **DisplayName** attribute changes from the User Principal Name (user_fabrikam.com#EXT#@contoso.com) to the sign-in name (user@fabrikam.com)

trans-unit.source: Tracking these attributes in Azure AD can help you troubleshoot whether or not a partner user has redeemed their B2B collaboration invitation.
trans-unit.target: Tracking these attributes in Azure AD can help you troubleshoot whether or not a partner user has redeemed their B2B collaboration invitation.

trans-unit.source: Browse our other articles on Azure B2B collaboration:
trans-unit.target: Browse our other articles on Azure B2B collaboration:

trans-unit.source: What is Azure AD B2B collaboration?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure AD B2B collaboration?
